```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

# the nice way
```{r}
df <- path %>% 
  excel_sheets() %>% 
  set_names() %>% 
map_df(~ read_excel(path = path, sheet = .x), .id = "sheet")


```

```{r}
df %>% glimpse()
```

```{r}
my_districts <- c("ORLEANS PARISH","CITY OF CHICAGO SD 299","DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA PUBLIC SCHOOLS", "RECOVERY SCHOOL DISTRICT-LDE")

(df_out <- df %>%
    mutate(year = `spring of tested year`,
           district = `education agency name`,
           ela = `Estimated District Mean in ela: grade equivalent std (gs)`,
           ela_se =  `Estimated District Mean SE in ela: grade equivalent std (gs)`,
           math = `Estimated District Mean in math: grade equivalent std (gs)`,
           math_se = `Estimated District Mean SE in math: grade equivalent std (gs)`) %>%
    filter(district %in% my_districts) %>%
    arrange(district) %>%
    write_csv('chicago_comparisons.csv')
  
)
   
# mutate(year = str_extract(sheet, '[0-9]{4}))
 
   

```
```{r}
df %>% View
```

```{r}
df_out %>% ggplot(aes(x = year, y = math, color = district)) +
  geom_line()  +
  facet_wrap(~grade) +
  theme(axis.text.x=element_text(angle=45,hjust=1)) +
  ylab('Normalized math-score')
ggsave('schools.png', plot = last_plot(), device = NULL, path = NULL,
  scale = 1, width = NA, height = NA, units = c("in", "cm", "mm"),
  dpi = 300, limitsize = TRUE)
```


```{r}
df_out %>% ggplot(aes(x = year, y = ela, color = district)) +
  geom_line()  +
  facet_wrap(~grade)+
  theme(axis.text.x=element_text(angle=45,hjust=1)) +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = ela - ela_se,ymax = ela + ela_se)) +
  ylab('Normalized ela-score')
ggsave('schools_ela.png', plot = last_plot(), device = NULL, path = NULL,
  scale = 1, width = NA, height = NA, units = c("in", "cm", "mm"),
  dpi = 300, limitsize = TRUE)
```
